alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 6:58PM PST until January 18 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Portions of I-90 will be impacted by snow and ice
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
